Key Match Events: Carlos Rodon pitched a dominant game with 9 strikeouts and no walks, leading the Yankees to a 5-2 victory in Game 1 of the ALCS
Post-Match Reflections: Carlos Rodon expressed satisfaction with his performance and mentioned the importance of team support
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was Rodon's first career postseason win
Others: Rodon's pitch count was 93, the most by a Yankee pitcher in a postseason game in the pitch-tracking era (since 2008)
